name: Percent Necrosis Post Neoadjuvant
title: Percent Necrosis Post Neoadjuvant
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of microscopically confirmed Percent Necrosis Post Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy can be used to code this data item if no other documentation is available.

**Note 2:** Record percentage value of the tumor necrosis post neoadjuvant chemotherapy as recorded in the pathology report from resection of the primary tumor.

**Note 3:** Code XXX.9 if surgical resection of the primary site after neoadjuvant therapy is performed and there is no mention of percent necrosis.
